title: Cinta dan Dendam
description: For her grandfather's sake, Kalli had agreed to an arranged marriage to Nikolos Varos -- a man she'd never even met. But when her grandfather died on her wedding day -- so, too, did her reason for marrying.... Niko was furious he'd been jilted. So he insisted Kalli continue with the original plan that she renovate his home -- not telling her he'd be living there with her. Neither had expected the attraction that sizzled between them, and Niko, for one, was determined to catch the bride who'd got away!
author: Renee Roszel
